Articles.Content:
//Instructions//

This challenge is actually very simple. All you must do is launch this craft before it kills and resurrects your Kerbals as zombies.

(I\'m being deadly serious.)

//Limitations//

You cannot add any parts below the craft, and any parts attached via the top of the craft cannot hang below the bottom of the craft.

You have no forewarning of what the craft looks like. As such, there are no screenshots.

//Requirements//

C7 Aerospace Pack.

Good Luck.
just so you know, this is a joke.

I accept. Be back in a little after figuring out how. (serious)

Back. Here you go. Also they didn\'t live long after the screen sadly.

Umm... You just broke rule one.

DO NOT EDIT BELOW THE CAPSULE/CRAFT!!

Umm... You just broke rule one.

DO NOT EDIT BELOW THE CAPSULE/CRAFT!!

just so you know, this is a joke

Either his entry is applicable or the challenge gets taken down..
Oh, fine. Just want to see people\'s reactions to a necromantic craft.
